name: cordova-plugin-pedometer
author: Lee Crossley <leee@hotmail.co.uk> (http://ilee.co.uk/). Dario Salvi <dariosalvi78@gmail.com>
description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin for Pedometer to fetch pedestrian-related data, such as step counts and other information about the distance travelled. It works with hardware pedometers, like the Core Motion in iOS and Android motion processors.
